mapper.select: SELECT t1.busId, sum( t1.num ) allSales, t2.monthSales FROM ddw_order_view t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.busId bid, sum( t2.num ) monthSales, t2.NAME FROM ddw_order_view t2 WHERE t2.orderType = #{orderType} AND t2.busId IN ( ${busIds} ) AND t2.createTime LIKE #{date} GROUP BY busId ) t2 ON t1.busId = t2.bid AND t1.busId IN ( ${busIds} ) WHERE t1.orderType = #{orderType} GROUP BY busId
